text: Winnie-the-Pooh Pays a Visit () is a 1971 Soviet animated movie directed by Fyodor Khitruk.Умер художник-постановщик мультфильмов о Винни-Пухе Владимир ЗуйковВИННИ-ПУХ ИДЁТ В ГОСТИ (1971) ==Actors== * Vladimir Osenev as the narrator * Yevgeny Leonov as Winnie-the-Pooh * Iya Savvina as Piglet * Anatoly Shchukin as Rabbit == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: Winnie-the-Pooh Pays a Visit
